text: (nabiyē!) tama deviyangē śuddha vū somnasa takā udē savasa prārthanā karamin siṭinnanva oba eḷavā nodamanu. ovungē gaṇanayen kisivak obagē vagakīmak vannē næta. obagē gaṇanayen kisivak ovungē vagakīmak vannēda næta. ebævin oba ovunva eḷavuvahot obat aparādhakaruvangen keneku bavaṭa pat vannehiya
